name: In re RECANVASS OF ABSENTEE VOTES IN the 42D WARD, 3D, 22D AND 23D DIVISIONS. Appeal of Edward GALLOP et al.
name_abbreviation: In re Recanvass of Absentee Votes in the 42d Ward, 3d, 22d & 23d Divisions

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, and MANDERINO, JJ.
NIX, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: In re RECANVASS OF ABSENTEE VOTES IN the 42D WARD, 3D, 22D AND 23D DIVISIONS. Appeal of Edward GALLOP et al.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed.
NIX, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Frank M. Jackson, Herbert S. Levin, Franchot A. S. Golub, L. B. Stapleton, Philadelphia, for appellants.
Stephen P. Gallagher, Nicholas Panarella, Jr., Larrick B. Stapleton, Philadelphia, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
331 A.2d 658
In re RECANVASS OF ABSENTEE VOTES IN the 42D WARD, 3D, 22D AND 23D DIVISIONS. Appeal of Edward GALLOP et al.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 14, 1975.
Decided Feb. 20, 1975.
Rehearing Denied March 25, 1975.
Frank M. Jackson, Herbert S. Levin, Franchot A. S. Golub, L. B. Stapleton, Philadelphia, for appellants.
Stephen P. Gallagher, Nicholas Panarella, Jr., Larrick B. Stapleton, Philadelphia, for appellees.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, and MANDERINO, JJ.
